description:
*** tran-go+ THE 8-in-1 TRAVEL DICTIONARY ***

tran-go+ is a completely offline travel dictionary for smartphones in 8 languages
including a total of over 48.000 entries. Essential for your journey! 

tran-go+ contains the following languages:

-English
-German 
-French 
-Spanish
-Italian
-Chinese
-Russian
-Hungarian


Features:

-Specifically assembled travel vocabulary for your journey 
-Total of over 48.000 entries in 8 languages 
-Includes modern terms 
-Includes useful phrases and sentence structures 
-Yet another plus: Vocabulary completely offline, no Internet connection required 
-Simultaneous translation from the selected source language to all other 7 languages by one click
-Indication of the travel situation for each term (Everyday life, Gastronomy, Medicine, Tourism etc.)
-Filtering of the results by arbitrary situations
-Ease of Use 
-Simplified input by auto completion of the search term 
-Quick source language change
-Localisation of the app for all 8 languages

Please note: in case of device limitations Chinese is disabled as input language
